title: A Syrian Refugee's Story

multiple-choice.question: What is the primary function of a constitution in a democratic government?

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: To outline the rights and freedoms of citizens

options.label: D
options.text: To specify the powers of the military

options.label: C
options.text: A decentralized economy with free trade

options.label: C

options.label: D

options.label: B
options.text: Rising sea levels and more frequent natural disasters

options.label: C
options.text: Improved air quality and reduced pollution

multiple-choice.question: What is the main difference between a monarchy and a republic?

options.label: A
options.text: A monarchy is ruled by a king or queen, while a republic is ruled by a president

options.label: B
options.text: A monarchy is a system of government where power is held by the people, while a republic is a system of government where power is held by a single ruler

options.label: C
options.text: A monarchy is a system of government where power is held by a single ruler, while a republic is a system of government where power is held by the people

options.label: D
options.text: A monarchy is a system of government where power is held by the military, while a republic is a system of government where power is held by the people

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: The spread of Christianity and other religions

options.label: D
options.text: The desire for natural resources and trade

multiple-choice.question: What is the main difference between a democracy and an oligarchy?

options.label: A
options.text: A democracy is a system of government where power is held by the people, while an oligarchy is a system of government where power is held by a small group of people

options.label: B
options.text: A democracy is a system of government where power is held by a single ruler, while an oligarchy is a system of government where power is held by the people

options.label: C
options.text: A democracy is a system of government where power is held by a small group of people, while an oligarchy is a system of government where power is held by the people

options.label: D
options.text: A democracy is a system of government where power is held by the military, while an oligarchy is a system of government where power is held by the people

multiple-choice.question: Which of the following is a consequence of imperialism?

options.label: A
options.text: The spread of cultural and economic exchange between colonizers and indigenous peoples

options.label: B
options.text: The establishment of new trade routes and the expansion of global markets

options.label: C
options.text: The exploitation of natural resources and the subjugation of indigenous peoples

options.label: D
options.text: The decline of urban centers and the rise of rural economies

multiple-choice.question: What is the main difference between a socialist and a capitalist economy?

options.label: A
options.text: A socialist economy is a system where the government controls the means of production, while a capitalist economy is a system where private individuals control the means of production

options.label: B
options.text: A socialist economy is a system where private individuals control the means of production, while a capitalist economy is a system where the government controls the means of production

options.label: C
options.text: A socialist economy is a system where the means of production are owned by the people, while a capitalist economy is a system where the means of production are owned by private individuals

options.label: D
options.text: A socialist economy is a system where the means of production are owned by the government, while a capitalist economy is a system where the means of production are owned by private individuals

multiple-choice.question: Which of the following is a key characteristic of a totalitarian regime?

options.label: A
options.text: A system of government where power is held by the people

options.label: B
options.text: A system of government where power is held by a single ruler

options.label: C
options.text: A system of government where the government has complete control over all aspects of society

options.label: D
options.text: A system of government where the government is limited by a constitution

options.label: C

options.label: C
options.text: To stop reseparation of fat from water

What is the process of spinning milk at high speeds to separate fat from liquid called?

title: Are Deodorants Bad For You?

options.text: Fatty oils in sweat that break down into acids

What determines whether a person has dry or wet ear wax?
What is the primary function of deodorants?

options.label: B
options.text: To block the ducts that produce sweat

options.label: C
options.text: To mask the smell or kill bacteria that cause the smell

options.text: Deodorants are more effective at stopping sweat

options.label: B

options.label: C
options.text: Deodorants mask the smell, while antiperspirants block sweat ducts

options.label: B
options.text: A moderate link between deodorant and cancer

options.label: C
options.text: No link between deodorant and cancer

options.label: D
options.text: A link between deodorant and cancer, but only in certain populations

options.label: C
options.text: They starve the bacteria by blocking sweat ducts

options.label: D
options.text: They have no effect on the bacteria

options.label: B

options.label: D

title: Mammoths vs. Mastodons: what's the criteria for de-extinction?

title: How cars went from boxy to curvy
